item.title: Simple Taproot Channels
item.description: Elle Mouton and Oliver Gugger join us to talk with us about the Simple Taproot Channel proposal.

item.title: Chaincode Decoded: Mempool
item.description: The Chaincode Decoded segment returns and we jump into the deep end of the mempool.
